tool_description: Analyzes relationships and patterns among multiple symptoms to identify clinically meaningful symptom clusters and syndromes.

symptom_list.description: Complete list of patient symptoms to analyze

temporal_relationships.description: Temporal relationships between symptoms (e.g., 'symptom A preceded symptom B')

severity_scores.description: Severity scores corresponding to each symptom

error_messages: Insufficient symptoms: Provide at least 2 symptoms for cluster analysis.
Mismatched arrays: If provided, temporal relationships and severity scores arrays must correspond to symptom list.
Invalid severity scores: Severity scores must be positive numbers.
Clustering failed: Unable to identify meaningful symptom patterns.
Invalid symptom format: All symptoms must be provided as descriptive text.
usage: Input a list of patient symptoms with optional temporal relationships and severity scores. The tool identifies symptom clusters and patterns that may suggest specific conditions or syndromes.

cluster_significance.description: Clinical significance of each symptom cluster
